author: John Paul Tasker
title: Construction work continues on Parliament Hill even as MPs, senators are told to stay away
description: Most MPs and senators have been told to stay away from Parliament Hill because of the public health risks involved in having a large number of people congregating in one place during a pandemic — but the same rules don't apply to the labourers carrying out re…
